description: Product Description What can TURNART chamois leathers do for you? Use chamois leathers to dry and polish polished surfaces, glass, mirrors, and car bodies. The real chamois leather has unique characteristics. The sheepskin is tanned through the traditional oil tanning process to make it soft and durable. The moist TURNART chamois leathers can dry the surface of your car and shine without leaving any water stains. Sheepskin itself is unique, and its natural open fiber structure is not available in any other leather. It has amazing effects in wiping cars, glasses, camera lenses, windows, etc. The Chamois is a natural and environmentally safe option Smell of fish oil used in the tanning process. This smell will disappear after the initial rinse TURNART CHAMOIS LEATHERS FOR CARS Dry the car without leaving water stains. Provide 3 sizes according to your different needs. S /50*40CM (thin, suitable for wiping glasses, cameras, etc.) M /60*40CM (medium thickness, suitable for cleaning cars, mirrors, windows, etc.) L /90*60CM (the thickest, largest, suitable for cleaning cars, windows, etc.) Have a soft and open grain structure to the surface, improving absorbency and polishing power Super soft and highly absorbent, for a fast streak free finish, no man made product can get close for cleaning and drying. TURNART natural chamois leather is more durable and will not tear as easily as man-made fiber cloth. You can cut the chamois leather into different sizes according to different needs. Because the chamois will not spread out like artificial cloth. Genuine natural leather, 100% bio-degradable, produced using non toxic process This genuine Chamois Leather, made using traditional tannery process will provide long lasting drying and polishing service. Every Chamois is unique in shape and grain and whilst we make every effort to ensure we supply only the very best products should you receive a product you are not entirely happy with, just let us know and we will send you a replacement free of charge. The ability to dry water is 8-10 times stronger than ordinary drying towels. The car body and window glass wiped with a slightly damp shammy cloth can be quickly dried within 10 seconds without leaving water marks, nor does it scratch the paint like a normal drying towel and leave cotton wool that is difficult to remove.
